title: Crispy Chicken Wings with Ranchitas
ingredients: V4 bags of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante (or flavor of your choice).
instructions: Step 1. Place the wings in a bowl and add the spices, stirring until everything is completely mixed. Cover the bowl and place it in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
Step 2. After one hour, add half of the flour to the wings.
Step 3. Crush the Ranchitas until they have a texture similar to panko or breadcrumbs, place them in a bowl.
Step 4. Beat the eggs and the other half of the flour, then incorporate the crushed Ranchitas until everything forms a thick mixture.

Step 6. Dip the wings in the mixture and cook them in the oil for approximately 15 to 20 minutes, or until they reach an internal temperature of 74°C. Drain on paper towels and serve with ranch sauce or your favorite sauce.
